original_text: Then the dukes of Edom shall be amazed; the mighty men of Moab, trembling shall take hold upon them; all the inhabitants of Canaan shall melt away.
korean_text: 에돔 두령들이 놀라고 모압 영웅이 떨림에 잡히며 가나안 주민이 다 낙담하나이다

sentences.original_text: Then the dukes of Edom shall be amazed
the mighty men of Moab, trembling shall take hold upon them
all the inhabitants of Canaan shall melt away
